downloadTitle: Windows Update Servicing with Write Filter (WUS-WF) Solution
downloadDescription: This file contains the Windows Update Servicing with Write Filter (WUS-WF) solution.
detailsSection: This solution allows you to implement a Windows Update Servicing with Write Filter (WUS-WF) for File-Based Write Filter (FBWF) and Enhanced Write Filter (EWF)-enabled Windows Embedded Standard 7 images.
systemRequirementsSection: A web browser and an utility that extracts ZIP files.
installInstructionSection: Click Download and follow the instructions
additionalInformationSection:
